app_title: === UBUNTU APLIKASIYON YU CI YÀLLA SISTEEM ===
no_root: Aplikasiyon bii war na dugub root!
checking_internet: Dama ko xool conexion bu internet...
timeshift_missing: Timeshift samp koo wuul. Amul snapshot yu def.
creating_snapshot: Dama ko def snapshot ak Timeshift...
update_packages: Dama ko yàlla limu pakeet yi...
update_error: Njumte ci yàllal limu pakeet yi
install_error: Njumte ci sammee yàllaale yu pakeet
dist_upgrade: Dama ko xool yàllaale yu distribution...
removing_obsolete: Dama ko dindi pakeet yu yàgg...
cleaning_cache: Dama ko sedd cache bu pakeet yi...
updating_snap: Dama ko yàlla pakeet yu Snap...
snap_error: Njumte ci yàllal pakeet yu Snap
updating_flatpak: Dama ko yàlla pakeet yu Flatpak...
flatpak_error: Njumte ci yàllal pakeet yu Flatpak
reboot_message: Reboot war na ngir jeex yàllaale yi.
help_description: uubu - Jumtukaay yàlla bu otomatik ngir Ubuntu/Kubuntu
help_desc_long:
uubu (Update Upgrade Ubuntu) dafa otomatikee yàllaale yu sisteem yu lépp.
Da ko yàlla APT, Snap, Flatpak, da ko sedd sisteem te di jox reboot su soxla.
flag_snapshot: Def snapshot Timeshift ba ngi yàlla
flag_quiet: Mood mu sedd (ay bataaxal yu jottali)
flag_dist_upgrade: Def yeesalkat yu yagg ci sistem bi (ci lool ak jëfandikoo ay pakeet yu yàgg)
upgrade: Xool yeesalkat yu pakeet yu am...
